name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hebrew Tooltip Translation for Google Chromeâ„¢

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate Hebrew to English and vice-versa via tooltip

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translate Hebrew to English and English to Hebrew by just hovering the mouse over a word using Morfix translation.

Also has options to let you translate by: Ctrl-Click or Shift-highlight and other options, too!
